meanings.definition: The state of being quiet or calm.
meanings.sent1: The library is known for its quietness.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the quietness of the early morning.
meanings.sent3: The quietness of the sleeping cat was interrupted by a loud sneeze.
meanings.sent4: In the quietness of the forest, you can hear the rustling of leaves.
meanings.sent5: The quietness of the snowfall was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The absence of noise or disturbance.
meanings.sent1: The quietness of the room was eerie.
meanings.sent2: I long for the quietness of the countryside.
meanings.sent3: The sudden quietness in the classroom made everyone look up.
meanings.sent4: The quietness of the desert at night is haunting.
meanings.sent5: The quietness of the empty house was unsettling.
